headline: A Look At Synchrony Financial’s Valuation As 2025 Revenue Guidance Tempers Reaction To Strong Q4 Earnings
summary: Synchrony Financial (SYF) is back in focus after its latest earnings update, where better-than-expected adjusted EPS contrasted with a cautious 2025 net revenue outlook tied to moderating consumer spending and anticipated Federal Reserve rate cuts. See our latest analysis for Synchrony Financial. Synchrony’s latest guidance has come after a choppy few weeks for the stock, with a 16.37% decline in the 1 month share price return and a 12.59% drop year to date, even though the 1 year total...
